data.title: Scandinavian Royalty: King Gustaf VI Adolf of Sweden and Queen Louise
data.meta_description:
Sold for $0 |  Scandinavian Royalty: King Gustaf Adolf VI and Queen Louise, daughter of Charles XV of Sweden and spouse of Frederick VIII of Denmark.

Two
data.text:
Description

Scandinavian Royalty: King Gustaf Adolf VI and Queen Louise, daughter of Charles XV of Sweden and spouse of Frederick VIII of Denmark.

Two items:

1. King Gustaf Adolf VI: DS, one page, 8.25 x 11.75, November 24, 1961, conferring the Swedish vice-consul at Falmouth, Mr. Philip Hamilton Fox, signed above the crisply embossed paper seal in blue ballpoint by King Gustaf Adolf VI. Accompanied by a complete translation in French.

2. Queen Louise: an untranslated ALS in Swedish and German, signed "Louise," three pages on two adjoining sheets, 4 x 5.25, no date, addressed to the Prime Minister and Duc of Norway advising him to take a neutral stance in the event that the current difficulties between France and England escalate into war. Accompanied by an original unpublished tintype of Louise from the 1860s.

In overall fine condition.

Auction Info

Auction Title: September

Dates: #535 - Ended September 12, 2018

This item is Pre-Certified by PSA/DNA
